articles.title: Why Was Bruce Springsteen Busted for DWI? A Lawyer Explains - Billboard
articles.description: Billboard spoke to a New Jersey attorney who specializes in DUI cases to explain why Bruce Springsteen might have been arrested for DWI in his home state in November.
articles.content: What confounded many observers, though, was the detail that Springsteen reportedly blew a .02 on the breathalyzer test, which is one-quarter of his home state's .08 legal limit for driving while into… [+6491 chars]
